name: The Mannequins
description:
In this game you are stuck in a house with weird mannequins . You don't know how you got there  or what happened but you know that you have to escape! Short Horror game - 5 min max!

Controls :

- WASD = Walk

- Shift = Sprint

- " E " = Interact / Close Note

If you enjoy the game don't forget to leave a comment :D Thanks!
